gates.name: Outcome Traceability Gate
gates.description: Minimum outcome measurement capability required for higher maturity
gates.label: Outcome traceability ≥ 4
gates.rationale: Cannot achieve higher maturity without measurable outcome tracking

gates.name: Delivery Flow Gate
gates.description: Core delivery capabilities must be established
gates.label: Lead time ≥ 4 AND Release safety ≥ 4
gates.rationale: Delivery fundamentals are prerequisite for organizational maturity

gates.name: Reliability Gate
gates.description: System reliability must be measurable and managed
gates.label: SLOs & MTTR ≥ 4
gates.rationale: Reliability measurement is essential for scalable operations

gates.name: Customer Alignment Gate
gates.description: Customer understanding and measurement literacy required
gates.label: Customer proximity & KPI literacy ≥ 4
gates.rationale: Customer alignment prevents feature factories and waste

gates.name: Strategic Alignment Gate
gates.description: Strategy must be connected to execution via OKRs
gates.label: Strategy→OKR ≥ 3.5

gates.name: Financial Transparency Gate
gates.description: Cost management and budget transparency required
gates.label: Cost-to-serve & Squad budget ≥ 3.5

caps.name: Delivery Flow Cap
caps.description: Cap overall maturity if core delivery practices are weak
caps.label: Cap 2.4 if Lead time < 3 or Release < 3
caps.rationale: Poor delivery flow fundamentally limits organizational capability

caps.name: Customer Proximity Cap
caps.description: Cap maturity if customer understanding is minimal
caps.label: Cap 2.9 if Customer proximity ≤ 2
caps.rationale: Without customer proximity, teams build features rather than outcomes

caps.name: Outcome Traceability Cap
caps.description: Cap maturity if outcome measurement is absent
caps.label: Cap 3.0 if Outcome traceability ≤ 2
caps.rationale: Cannot demonstrate higher maturity without measuring business outcomes

validationRules.name: Tier 1 Foundation Requirements
validationRules.description: Core practices must be established before advancing
validationRules.message: Complete foundational practices before advancing to tier 2

validationRules.name: Tier 2 Capability Requirements
validationRules.description: Established capabilities required for advanced practices
validationRules.message: Establish core capabilities before advancing to tier 3
